ai-pp2.8:1.1_0: Herein, what are the four paths of fruit?
ai-pp2.8:1.2_0: the stream-enterer, and he who is practising for the direct realisation of the fruit of stream-entry,
ai-pp2.8:1.3_0: the once-returner, and he who is practising for the direct realisation of the fruit of once-returning,
ai-pp2.8:1.4_0: the non-returner, and he who is practising for the direct realisation of the fruit of non-returning,
ai-pp2.8:1.5_0: the Worthy One, and he who is practising for the direct realisation of the fruit of Worthiness,
ai-pp2.8:1.6_0: These are the four paths of fruit and benefit.
